{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <BOOKLIST>
        <BOOK>
            <AUTHOR>Bey Hrn. Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder</AUTHOR>
            <ENTRY>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Frischens Harpfen Davids</TITLE>
                    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                    <VOLUME>2. Tom.</VOLUME>
                    <PRIZE>fl. 2. 30. xr.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <AUTHOR>Stähelins</AUTHOR>
                    <TITLE>Predigten</TITLE>
                    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                    <PRIZE>48. xr.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Sammlung auserlesener Cantzel-Reden</TITLE>
                    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                    <VOLUME>Erster Theil</VOLUME>
                    <PRIZE>56. xr.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <AUTHOR>Bonds</AUTHOR>
                    <TITLE>Satyrische Gedichte</TITLE>
                    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                    <PRIZE>18. xr.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <AUTHOR>Bonds</AUTHOR>
                    <TITLE>Brieffe</TITLE>
                    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                    <PRIZE>9. xr.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Tempe Helvetica</TITLE>
                    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                    <VOLUME>5. Tom.</VOLUME>
                    <PRIZE>fl. 6.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <AUTHOR>Alardins</AUTHOR>
                    <TITLE>Geistlicher Thee-Brauch</TITLE>
                    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                    <PRIZE>4. xr.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Nachricht von Joh. Bossarten</TITLE>
                    <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT>
                    <PRIZE>6. xr.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR>
                    <TITLE>heilige Reden</TITLE>
                    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                    <VOLUME>1ter Tom.</VOLUME>
                    <PRIZE>30. xr.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <AUTHOR>Fischers</AUTHOR>
                    <TITLE>Anmerckungen</TITLE>
                    <VOLUME>6. Stück complet</VOLUME>
                    <PRIZE>fl. 1.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <AUTHOR>Brachmann</AUTHOR>
                    <TITLE>complet</TITLE>
                    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
                    <PRIZE>fl. 1. 30. xr.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
            </ENTRY>
            <BOUND>
                <BIBL>
                    <AUTHOR>Fabri</AUTHOR>
                    <TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE>
                    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
                    <PRIZE>9. Pfund.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Scriptores Helvetii</TITLE>
                    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
                    <VOLUME>2. Tom.</VOLUME>
                    <PRIZE>3. Pfund 10. ü.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <AUTHOR>Simlers</AUTHOR>
                    <TITLE>Regiment der Eydgenössischen Eidgenossenschaft</TITLE>
                    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                    <PRIZE>1. Pfund 17. ü.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Valerius Maro Amst.</TITLE>
                    <PRIZE>18. ü.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Novum Testamentum Graecum</TITLE>
                    <PRIZE>2. Pfund.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Homer: Ilias & Odyssee</TITLE>
                    <PRIZE>12. 2. Pfund.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Judas der Erzschelm</TITLE>
                    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
                    <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
                    <PRIZE>4. Pf.</PRIZE>
                </BIBL>
            </BOUND>
        </BOOK>
    </BOOKLIST>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":18,"explanation":"1. Added XML declaration.
2. Wrapped the entire content in a structured hierarchy with `<ITEM>`, `<BOOKLIST>`, `<BOOK>`, `<ENTRY>`, and `<BOUND>` tags to logically separate unbound and bound books.
3. Fixed malformed tags: `<PRICE>` to `<PRIZE>`.
4. Corrected special characters: �b to 'b', �fc to 'ü', �a7 to 'ä', �221a to appropriate punctuation (e.g., quotation marks, asterisks).
5. Added `<ENTRY>` tag to group unbound books.
6. Added `<BOUND>` tag to group bound books.
7. Corrected the title 'Tempe Helveticg' to 'Tempe Helvetica'.
8. Corrected the title 'Homen Hias & Odyfl.' to 'Homer: Ilias & Odyssee'.
9. Corrected 'Valer. Mar- Amst.' to 'Valerius Maro Amst.'
10. Corrected 'Nov. Testam. Graec.' to 'Novum Testamentum Graecum'.
11. Corrected 'Eydgno�fcschafft' to 'Eydgenössischen Eidgenossenschaft'.
12. Corrected 'St�a7helins' to 'Stähelins'.
13. Corrected 'VOLUME' tag for '6. Stuck complet' to '6. Stück complet'.
14. Fixed formatting abbreviations: '4t�2264' to '4to', '8v�2264' to '8vo'.
15. Added missing `<AUTHOR>` tag for the entry 'Bey Hrn. Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder'.
16. Added missing `<FORMAT>` tag for '8.' to '8' (assuming octavo format).
17. Standardized abbreviations like 'xr.' and 'fl.' consistently.
18. Ensured all tags are properly closed and nested."}

parsed.explanation:
1. Added XML declaration.
2. Wrapped the entire content in a structured hierarchy with `<ITEM>`, `<BOOKLIST>`, `<BOOK>`, `<ENTRY>`, and `<BOUND>` tags to logically separate unbound and bound books.
3. Fixed malformed tags: `<PRICE>` to `<PRIZE>`.
4. Corrected special characters: �b to 'b', �fc to 'ü', �a7 to 'ä', �221a to appropriate punctuation (e.g., quotation marks, asterisks).
5. Added `<ENTRY>` tag to group unbound books.
6. Added `<BOUND>` tag to group bound books.
7. Corrected the title 'Tempe Helveticg' to 'Tempe Helvetica'.
8. Corrected the title 'Homen Hias & Odyfl.' to 'Homer: Ilias & Odyssee'.
9. Corrected 'Valer. Mar- Amst.' to 'Valerius Maro Amst.'
10. Corrected 'Nov. Testam. Graec.' to 'Novum Testamentum Graecum'.
11. Corrected 'Eydgno�fcschafft' to 'Eydgenössischen Eidgenossenschaft'.
12. Corrected 'St�a7helins' to 'Stähelins'.
13. Corrected 'VOLUME' tag for '6. Stuck complet' to '6. Stück complet'.
14. Fixed formatting abbreviations: '4t�2264' to '4to', '8v�2264' to '8vo'.
15. Added missing `<AUTHOR>` tag for the entry 'Bey Hrn. Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder'.
16. Added missing `<FORMAT>` tag for '8.' to '8' (assuming octavo format).
17. Standardized abbreviations like 'xr.' and 'fl.' consistently.
18. Ensured all tags are properly closed and nested.
